mapper.select: select count(1) from mman_user_loan where id = #{ID}
select loan_status from mman_user_loan where id = #{ID}
select count(1) from mman_user_info where id = #{ID}
select count(1) from mman_user_rela where user_id = #{ID}
mapper.insert: insert into mman_user_loan( id, user_id, loan_py_id, loan_money, loan_rate, loan_penalty, loan_penalty_rate, service_charge, paid_money, loan_start_time, loan_end_time, loan_status, create_time, update_time, del_flag, loan_penalty_time, loan_sys_status, loan_sys_remark, term_number, merchant_no, accrual, borrowing_type, customer_type )values( #{id}, #{userId}, #{loanPyId}, #{loanMoney}, #{loanRate}, #{loanPenalty}, #{loanPenaltyRate}, #{serviceCharge}, #{paidMoney}, #{loanStartTime}, #{loanEndTime}, #{loanStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{loanPenaltyTime}, #{loanSysStatus}, #{loanSysRemark}, #{termNumber}, #{merchantNo}, #{accrual}, #{borrowingType}, #{customerType} )
mapper.update:
update mman_user_loan
user_id = #{userId},
accrual = #{accrual},
loan_py_id = #{loanPyId},
loan_money = #{loanMoney},
loan_rate = #{loanRate},
loan_penalty = #{loanPenalty},
loan_penalty_rate = #{loanPenaltyRate},
service_charge = #{serviceCharge},
loan_start_time = #{loanStartTime},
loan_end_time = #{loanEndTime},
loan_status = #{loanStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_time = now(),
del_flag = #{delFlag},
loan_penalty_time = #{loanPenaltyTime},
loan_sys_status = #{loanSysStatus},
loan_sys_remark = #{loanSysRemark},
customer_type = #{customerType},
where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into credit_loan_pay ( id, loan_id, receivable_startdate, receivable_date, receivable_money, receivable_principle, receivable_interest, real_money, realget_principle, realget_interest, status, create_date, update_Date, rest_principle, installmentMethod, realget_service_charge, remain_service_charge, realget_accrual, remain_accrual, create_By, update_By )values( #{id}, #{loanId}, #{receivableStartdate}, #{receivableDate}, #{receivableMoney}, #{receivablePrinciple}, #{receivableInterest}, #{realMoney}, #{realgetPrinciple}, #{realgetInterest}, #{status}, #{createDate},
#{updateDate},
now(),
#{restPrinciple}, #{installmentMethod}, #{realgetServiceCharge}, #{remainServiceCharge}, #{realgetAccrual}, #{remainAccrual}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy} )
mapper.update:
update credit_loan_pay
loan_id = #{loanId},
receivable_startdate = #{receivableStartdate},
receivable_date = #{receivableDate},
receivable_money = #{receivableMoney},
receivable_principle = #{receivablePrinciple},
receivable_interest = #{receivableInterest},
real_money = #{realMoney},
realget_principle = #{realgetPrinciple},
realget_interest = #{realgetInterest},
reduction_money = #{reductionMoney},
status = #{status},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_date = now(),
rest_principle = #{restPrinciple},
realget_service_charge = #{realgetServiceCharge},
remain_service_charge = #{remainServiceCharge},
realget_accrual = #{realgetAccrual},
remain_accrual = #{remainAccrual},
installmentMethod = #{installmentMethod},
create_By = #{createBy},
update_By = #{updateBy}
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from credit_loan_pay_detail where pay_id=#{PAY_ID}
select current_collection_user_id, overdueDays, s1_flag from mman_loan_collection_order where pay_id=#{PAY_ID} and loan_id=#{ORDER_ID}
mapper.insert:
insert into credit_loan_pay_detail( id, pay_id, real_money, real_penlty, real_principle, real_interest, return_type, remark, update_Date, create_By, update_By, create_date, bank_id, bank_flownum, real_date, current_collection_user_id, realget_accrual, remain_accrual, s1_flag )values( #{id}, #{payId}, #{realMoney}, #{realPenlty}, #{realPrinciple}, #{realInterest}, #{returnType}, #{remark},
#{updateDate},
now(),
#{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createDate}, #{bankId}, #{bankFlownum}, #{realDate}, #{currentCollectionUserId}, #{realgetAccrual}, #{remainAccrual}, #{s1Flag} )

insert into mman_user_rela( id, user_id, contacts_key, rela_key, info_name, info_value, contactsFlag, del_flag, contacts_value, rela_value, kv_vars, phone_num_loc, call_cnt, call_out_cnt, call_in_cnt, call_len, call_out_len, call_in_len )values( #{id}, #{userId}, #{contactsKey}, #{relaKey}, #{infoName}, #{infoValue}, #{contactsFlag}, #{delFlag}, #{contactsValue}, #{relaValue}, #{kvVars}, #{phoneNumLoc}, #{callCnt}, #{callOutCnt}, #{callInCnt}, #{callLen}, #{callOutLen}, #{callInLen} )

insert into sys_user_bank_card ( id, user_id, bank_card, deposit_bank, bank_institution_no, branch_bank, name, mobile, id_card, cvn, bank_code, city_code, city_name )values( #{id}, #{userId}, #{bankCard}, #{depositBank}, #{bankInstitutionNo}, #{branchBank}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{idCard}, #{cvn}, #{bankCode}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName} )
mapper.update:
update sys_user_bank_card
user_id = #{userId},
bank_card = #{bankCard},
deposit_bank = #{depositBank},
bank_institution_no = #{bankInstitutionNo},
branch_bank = #{branchBank},
name = #{name},
mobile = #{mobile},
id_card = #{idCard},
cvn = #{cvn},
bank_code = #{bankCode},
city_code = #{cityCode},
city_name = #{cityName},
where id=#{id}
update collection_withholding_record set status=1 where id = #{ID}
mapper.insert: insert into mman_loan_collection_status_change_log( id, loan_collection_order_id, before_status, after_status, type, create_date, operator_name, remark, company_id, current_collection_user_id, current_collection_user_level, current_collection_Order_Level )values( #{id}, #{loanCollectionOrderId}, #{beforeStatus}, #{afterStatus}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{operatorName}, #{remark}, #{companyId}, #{currentCollectionUserId}, #{currentCollectionUserLevel}, #{currentCollectionOrderLevel} )
mapper.select: select id as id, order_id as orderId, dispatch_name as dispatchName, current_collection_user_id as currentCollectionUserId, current_overdue_level as currentOverdueLevel, status as status, operator_name as operatorName, s1_flag as s1Flag, remark as remark from mman_loan_collection_order where user_id=#{USER_ID} and loan_id=#{ORDER_ID}
select id as id, user_name as userName, company_id as companyId, group_level as groupLevel, uuid as uuid from back_user where uuid=#{ID}
SELECT SUM(d.real_money) as sumRealMoney, SUM(d.real_penlty) as sumRealPenlty FROM credit_loan_pay_detail d WHERE d.pay_id = #{payId}

SELECT id AS id, operation_user_id AS operationUserId, orderId AS orderId, loan_user_id AS loanUserId, status AS status, pay_id AS payId, createtime AS createtime, type AS type, reduction_money AS reductionMoney FROM audit_center WHERE pay_id = #{payId} ORDER BY createtime DESC limit 1
mapper.delete: DELETE l, p, o, log, d, r FROM mman_user_loan l LEFT JOIN mman_loan_collection_order o ON l.id = o.loan_id LEFT JOIN credit_loan_pay p ON p.loan_id = o.loan_id LEFT JOIN mman_loan_collection_status_change_log log ON log.loan_collection_order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN credit_loan_pay_detail d ON d.pay_id = p.id LEFT JOIN mman_loan_collection_record r ON r.order_id = o.id WHERE l.id=#{loanId}
